title: Extend temperature bar range to -50°C – +110°C

requirements.text: In TemperaturePanel.tsx, update the visual scale bar so that its minimum bound is -50°C and its maximum bound is +110°C. The percentage fill calculation for the bar and any tick/label positions must use this new range. Do not change any other aspect of the component (typography, colors, animation, ultra-precise display, etc.).

quotes: extend the temperature bar range to -50º c and to + 110ºc. DONT change anything else please

acceptanceCriteria: The temperature scale bar renders -50°C as its leftmost (0%) position.
The temperature scale bar renders +110°C as its rightmost (100%) position.
A temperature reading of 0°C fills the bar to approximately 30.8% ((0-(-50))/(110-(-50))).
A temperature reading of 110°C fills the bar to 100%.
A temperature reading of -50°C fills the bar to 0%.
No other change is visible in the TemperaturePanel or any other dashboard panel.

constraints: Do not change any other component, panel, hook, style, or file.
nonGoals: Changing temperature color thresholds or label text.
Modifying the animated number display logic.
Any changes to backend, other frontend panels, or global styles.
